document.full_text: coca-cola co's  quarterly results slightly missed wall street estimates, as the japan earthquake and the timing of marketing expenses overshadowed strong sales volume, and its shares fell 2.3 percent.
document.title: coca-cola profit misses on expenses, earthquake
lines_and_colors: coca-cola co's  quarterly results slightly missed wall street estimates, as the japan earthquake and the timing of marketing expenses overshadowed strong sales volume, and its shares fell 2.3 percent.
